title: BRIEF-Arianne Phosphate Says Extended On A $4.1 Mln Loan With Third Party Lenders
text:
BRIEF-Arianne Phosphate Says Extended On A $4.1 Mln Loan With Third Party Lenders

Stock Markets 2 hours ago (Oct 01, 2019 18:30)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Arianne Phosphate Says Extended On A $4.1 Mln Loan With Third Party Lenders Oct 1 (Reuters) - Arianne Phosphate Inc : * ARIANNE EXTENDS LOAN FINANCING * ARIANNE PHOSPHATE INC - HAS EXTENDED ON A $4.1 MILLION LOAN WITH VARIOUS THIRD PARTY LENDERS * ARIANNE PHOSPHATE INC - EXTENDED LOAN IS IN AGGREGATE AMOUNT OF $4.1 MILLION AND WILL HAVE A MATURITY OF SEPTEMBER 28, 2021

BRIEF-Arianne Phosphate Says Extended On A $4.1 Mln Loan With Third Party Lenders
description: BRIEF-Arianne Phosphate Says Extended On A $4.1 Mln Loan With Third Party Lenders
